greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of digits when A328316(n) is written in primorial base; number of prime factors in A328316(1+n), counted with multiplicity.
link: Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
program: A276086(n) = { my(m=1, p=2); while(n, m *= (p^(n%p)); n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (m); };
A276150(n) = { my(s=0, p=2, d); while(n, d = (n%p); s += d; n = (n-d)/p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (s); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 14 2019
